Fill

Let's see the most fundamental drawing command, Fill.

Code




  

    
The result will be like this:

  

  

    

  




How the code works



  

    

  

  

    
(*ebiten.Image).Fill is a function to fill the image with the specified color. The argument color is a value that implements color.Color interface in the standard image/color package. In this example, the color value is red (the red and alpha part is 0xff.)
